guiSET.core

Class ListItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • guiSET.core.Control
      • guiSET.core.ListItem

  • public class ListItem
extends Control
    Optimal item to add to ListView as it features firing the itemSelected event of ListView.
    Author:
    Mc-Zen

        public void setBackgroundColor(int clr)
        Description copied from class: Control
        Set the plain background color of the element. Actual displayed color can vary if the element is i.e. hovered over.
        Overrides:
        setBackgroundColor in class Control
        Parameters:
        clr - integer rgb color

      • setSelectionColor

        public void setSelectionColor(int selectionColor)
        Sets the background color for when the item is in its selected state. This also sets selectionHoverColor (a little darker / brighter depending on the brightness of the selectionColor).
        Parameters:
        selectionColor - selection color

      • setSelectionHoverColor

        Parameters:
